# Copilot Instructions

This repository is the Auto-Dev-Engine project. When working with this codebase, please follow these guidelines:

## Code Style
- Follow existing code patterns and conventions in the repository
- Use clear, descriptive variable and function names
- Include appropriate comments for complex logic

## GitHub Actions
- Workflows are located in `.github/workflows/`
- Use reusable workflow patterns when applicable
- Ensure proper permissions are specified

## Security
- Never commit secrets or credentials
- Use GitHub Secrets for sensitive values
- Follow the principle of least privilege for permissions

## Testing
- Test changes locally before committing
- Verify workflow syntax with `actionlint` when possible

## Pull Requests
- Use the pull request template
- Keep changes focused and atomic
- Provide clear descriptions of changes
